title: Automate release process and changelog generation
body:
Goal: Streamline the release process for ghcommon by automating versioning, changelog generation, and release publishing.

Acceptance Criteria:
- Releases are triggered by tags or PR merges to main.
- Changelog is generated automatically from conventional commits.
- Release artifacts are built and attached to GitHub Releases.
- Release notes are published with each release.
- Documentation is updated to describe the release process.

Technical Notes:
- Use semantic-release, release-please, or similar tools.
- Integrate with GitHub Actions for end-to-end automation.
- Ensure changelog format matches project standards.
- Support both manual and automated release triggers.
